LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmDMR.label: 3HST制9mm精确射手步枪
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmDMR.description: 3HST陆军狙击手的标配步枪，打人穿透过剩，反器材力不从心。
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmDMR.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmDMR.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmDMR.tools.2.label: 枪口
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmHMG.label: 3HST制9mm重磁轨炮
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmHMG.description: 一般安装在固定炮塔、载具，或者由重型火力掩护动力甲携带的重机枪，虽然完全可以手提，但是打的打不准另说。
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmHMG.tools.0.label: 枪托
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmHMG.tools.1.label: 枪管
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_9mmHMG.tools.2.label: 枪口
LanguageData.Turret_3HST9mmHMGmanned.label: Manned 9mm heavy machine railgun
LanguageData.Turret_3HST9mmHMGmanned.description: A 3HST heavy machine railgun mounted on an automatic mount. Despite the fact this turret is manually operated, this turret still needs a amount of power to operate since railguns consumes power.
LanguageData.Turret_3HST9mmHMGAuto.label: Auto 9mm heavy machine railgun
LanguageData.Turret_3HST9mmHMGAuto.description: A 3HST heavy machine railgun mounted on an automatic mount. Despite the fact this turret is manually operated, this turret still needs a amount of power to operate since railguns consumes power.
LanguageData.Gun_9mmHMG_Turret.label: Mounted 3HST 9mm HMG
